description: Defeat Agrith-Naar with the silverlight being the final blow. (NOTE: Do not run away as the final blow is being dealt or the demon will heal.)
You can flinch the demon by using the lanterns to evade the demon. To flinch you must only attack when the health bar can't be seen anymore and run back behind the lantern to avoid taking any damage.
